attributes.action: Only UK people who can vote should be allowed to donate to UK Political Parties
attributes.additional_details:
With modern social media, foreign individuals and governments to spread disinformation without the controls traditional media has.  Truth is being lost.   To limit this, we need to address who is controlling parliament.  

Only people who can vote should be allowed to donate to Political Parties. This should be limited to a modest amount. Otherwise, the power of each UK vote is diluted by those with money.  These payments need to be audited so bots don't bypass it.
attributes.background: Safeguard UK Elections from influence/money of foreign Individuals or Businesses. Debate the Electoral Commission rules so that the influence of Foreign Government, Individuals & business is controlled.  Donations should be modest.  IF YOU CAN'T VOTE IN UK ELECTIONS, THEN YOU CAN'T DONATE TO A PARTY

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707189
